title: Perspective contents lost when view is maximized
OB: When a view is maximized in any perspective in F1, all the contents of the perspective including views and layout information are lost except for the maximized view.
EB: To reproduce the issue, switch to another perspective and exit the workbench. Then open the workbench again and switch back to the perspective with the maximized view.
SR: The issue can be resolved by ensuring that when a view is maximized, the page layout is not replaced with a temporary layout that only contains the maximized view. The layout should preserve the other views in the perspective.
